UseCase.Description: Control a charger plug and unplug on a bench without powersupply and check battery and charger register value.
Control a charger plug and unplug on a bench without powersupply and when a call is active.
PUPDR Energy Management boot transition.
PUPDR. Generate a freeze board during the boot.
Battery SDP Discharge
Check the battery charging mode
EM - Check the battery current during an host communication error.
EM - Insert a new device with OTG and check if the board stays in low power mode.
Check the main battery charging in case of charger timer expiration. Check the capacity and status. When the status is "not charging", the test is stopped and we check the value of timer.
Test emergency call with a temperature equal to -5 Degree Celsius 25 Degree Celsius and 45 Degree Celsius

Parameter.name: CELL_BAND
Parameter.Description: Cell Band (from BAND1 to BAND10) for 3G or Cell Band (PGSM|RGSM|EGSM|GSM450|GSM480|GSM750|GSM850|TGSM810|PCS|DCS) for 2G

UseCase.Description: a turn OFF then ON board test that try to stick to end user way to do.

Parameter.name: BATT_MIN_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: minimal capacity limit to start the test, from 0% to 100%

Parameter.name: MIN_CAPACITY_TO_STOP_TEST
Parameter.Description: minimal capacity to stop the test, from 0% to 100%

Parameter.name: CABLE_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Cable type to use during test, must be a data cable

Parameter.name: KEEP_CABLE_DURING_SHUTDOWN
Parameter.Description: if TRUE, the cable will be left during the shutdown process

Parameter.name: BOOT_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Timeout in seconds to let the board boot

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_WAIT_AFTER_JUST_PERFORM_BOOT
Parameter.Description: Time in second to wait before interacting with the board after an iniate boot

Parameter.name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Timeout in second to let the board shutdown, if data cable is not kept during shutdown proces the whole timeout will be waited

Parameter.name: MAX_ITERATION
Parameter.Description: Number of off on cycle to do

Parameter.name: MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAIL
Parameter.Description: Number consecutive fail that will lead to stop the test

UseCase.Description: test that user as limited access to the fuel gauging file to avoid hacking
Permits to do an emergency call when battery critical threshold is reached.

Parameter.name: BATTERY_CRITICAL_THRESHOLD
Parameter.Description: Critical threshold of the battery (%) at which the test start , if you are above a discharge cycle will be done

Parameter.name: DISCHARGE_TIME
Parameter.Description: Discharge time to reached the critical threshold (seconds),each X second we will check the battery capacity level

Parameter.name: CALL_HOLD_TIME
Parameter.Description: Minimum time that the call must hold in second

Parameter.name: CELL_BAND
Parameter.Description: Cell Band (from BAND1 to BAND10) for 3G or Cell Band (PGSM|RGSM|EGSM|GSM450|GSM480|GSM750|GSM850|TGSM810|PCS|DCS) for 2G

UseCase.Description: test that vbatt threshold at shutdown evolve with the running load
EM - test device capability to export information about battery to userapp
EM - test device capability to export information about battery to userapp
EM - test device capability to export information about charger to userapp robustness
EM - test device capability to export information about battery to userapp
EM - test device capability to export information about charger to userapp robustness
EM - Platform shall wake up from low power mode upon USB insertion
Test the Japanese PSE Regulation Compliance

Parameter.name: BATT_MAX_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: maximum capacity at which the test is run, if you are above a discharge will be done

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger type to plug during the observation. Depending of what your io card can supoport, it can be one among : DCP, SDP, CDP and ACA

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_LET_DUT_ADJUST_CHARGING_PARAM
Parameter.Description: Time in second to let the DUT adjust its charging parameter to the given temperature range

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_LET_DUT_ADAPT_TO_TEST_TEMP
Parameter.Description: Time in second to let the DUT adapt to the given temperature range

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: load to apply when the DUT capacity is above BATT_START_CAPACITY

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: path of the file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO is on LOAD

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume of the media file in (%)

UseCase.Description: check that the platform battery information during charge discharge cycle
Adjust charging parameter during maintenance charging at different temperature

Parameter.name: BATT_START_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Exact capacity at which the test is run. If the current capacity is different, a discharge or charge will be done

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger type to plug during the observation. Depending of what your io card can supoport, it can be one among : DCP, SDP, CDP and ACA

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_LET_DUT_ADJUST_CHARGING_PARAM
Parameter.Description: Time in second to let the DUT adjust its charging parameter to the given temperature range

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_LET_DUT_ADAPT_TO_TEST_TEMP
Parameter.Description: Time in second to let the DUT adapt to the given temperature range

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: load to apply when the DUT capacity is above BATT_START_CAPACITY

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: path of the file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO is on LOAD

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume of the media file in (%)

UseCase.Description: test that the battery FULL identification is correctly done at an expected capacity and in time

Parameter.name: BATT_START_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Initial Battery Capacity (%) to start the test with

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger type to plug during test charging phase (SDP, CDP et DCP )

Parameter.name: CAPACITY_AT_WHICH_FULL_FIRST_APPEAR
Parameter.Description: Capacity at which the first battery FULL status should appear

Parameter.name: CHARGE_TO_FULL_DURATION
Parameter.Description: the charge duration to wait in second to reach FULL once BATT_START_CAPACITY is reached

Parameter.name: LOAD_TO_HELP_DISCHARGE_IN_SETUP
Parameter.Description: LOAD to apply to the board when discharging is need to reach BATT_START_CAPACITY

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: path of the file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO is on LOAD

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume of the media file in (%)

Parameter.name: WHAT_TO_CHECK
Parameter.Description: List of what can be checked by this test. the test verdict will depend of what you put here

UseCase.Description: check that the charge RESUME or STOP when exiting DUT temperature change

Parameter.name: BATT_MAX_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: maximum capacity at which the test is run, if you are above a discharge will be done

Parameter.name: SETUP_LOAD
Parameter.Description: load to apply when the DUT capacity is above BATT_START_CAPACITY

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: path of the file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO is on LOAD

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume of the media file in (%)

Parameter.name: START_MIN_TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: MIN Temperature at which we start to observe the battery/charger info in degrees Celsius

Parameter.name: START_MAX_TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: MIN Temperature at which we start to observe the battery/charger info in degrees Celsius

Parameter.name: STOP_TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: Temperature at which we expect that there is a change in charger/battery behavior in degrees Celsius

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger type to plug during the observation. Depending of what your io card can supoport, it can be one among : DCP, SDP, CDP and ACA

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_ADJUST_TO_START_TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: Maximum time in second to wait to let the battery adapt to the START range temperature

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_ADJUST_TO_STOP_TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: Maximum time in second to wait to let the battery adapt to the STOP temperature

Parameter.name: WHAT_TO_CHECK
Parameter.Description: What this usecase can check : CHARGE_STOP or CHARGE_RESUME

UseCase.Description: charge the board to full, then the test run load to discharge the board in order to see the charge resume

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: LOAD to launch to discharge board

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: path of the file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO is on LOAD

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume of the media file in (%)

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_FULL
Parameter.Description: Time max to charge to FULL

Parameter.name: EXIT_MAINTENANCE_CHARGING_THRESHOLD
Parameter.Description: Maintenance charging treshold (depend of the device)

Parameter.name: TEST_TYPE
Parameter.Description: What we are testing here STAY_IN_FULL or EXIT_MAINTENANCE_TRESHOLD

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_STABILIZE_BOARD
Parameter.Description: Time to wait for changing status after the treshold is reached

Parameter.name: TEST_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Timeout to ending test if device doesn't charge

UseCase.Description: check that the battery board used the new battery technology with Li-Ion/polymer : 4.35V

Parameter.name: HIGH_VOLTAGE_RANGE
Parameter.Description: the lowest value for battery voltage when reaching FULL, if we are below it, this will cause a FAIL

Parameter.name: LOW_VOLTAGE_RANGE
Parameter.Description: the highest value for battery voltage when reaching FULL, if we are above it this will cause a FAIL

Parameter.name: TIME_TO_CHARGE_TO_FULL
Parameter.Description: time in second allowed to charge the board to FULL once the minimal capacity for this test is reached

Parameter.name: BATT_MIN_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Minimal capacity to start the test, if you are below it, a charge setup will be done

UseCase.Description: Test the ability of the board to do an automatic shutdown when the battery capacity is at 0 percent.

Parameter.name: BATT_MAX_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: this is the capacity max capacity to begin the test with test

Parameter.name: DISCHARGE_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: timeout to let the board shutdown while discharging, if no data cable is used the full timeout will be waited

Parameter.name: CABLE_TYPE_DURING_DISCHARGE
Parameter.Description: Cable to keep plugged during discharge, can be NONE not to plug any cable

Parameter.name: LOAD_TO_HELP_DISCHARGE
Parameter.Description: LOAD to apply to the board when discharging

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: Path to audio/video file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO load is used

Parameter.name: VOLUME
Parameter.Description: Volume value in percent from 0 to 100 if VIDEO or AUDIO load is used

UseCase.Description: test what happen at thermal critical state on different sensors

Parameter.name: TEMPERATURE
Parameter.Description: Temperature that bring the DUT to reach a CRITICAL temperatue state in Degree Celsius or use SMART keyword to automaticly set this value

Parameter.name: TEMP_MAX_INCREASE_MARGIN
Parameter.Description: The maximum temperature increasing we can apply to TEMPERATURE in order to be at CRITICAL state

Parameter.name: SENSOR_TO_TEST
Parameter.Description: The sensor to test, it will depend of your DUT configuration, the more common are: BACKSKIN, FRONTSKIN, BATTERY

Parameter.name: TEMPERATURE_CHANGE_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: timeout to let the temperature change be seen by the DUT in second

UseCase.Description: check that there is no capacity jump when a charger is plugged

Parameter.name: TESTED_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Value of the capicity where the test is done

Parameter.name: PLUG_DURATION
Parameter.Description: Duration in second of the charger plug action

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: LOAD to apply to the board when discharging

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: Path to audio/video file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO load is used

UseCase.Description: check the status is charging when a charger is plugged with a load

Parameter.name: TESTED_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Value of the capicity where the test is done

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: LOAD to apply to the board when discharging

Parameter.name: MULTIMEDIA_FILE
Parameter.Description: Path to audio/video file to play if VIDEO or AUDIO load is used

UseCase.Description: Adjust charging parameter during charge and discharge of the board

Parameter.name: BATT_MIN_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: Minimal capacity to start the test, if you are below it, a charge setup will be done

Parameter.name: BATT_MAX_CAPACITY
Parameter.Description: this is the capacity max capacity to begin the test with test

Parameter.name: CYCLE_BEHAVIOR
Parameter.Description: Cycle behavior of the board, discharge or charge

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger type to plug during the observation. Depending of what your io card can supoport, it can be one among : DCP, SDP, CDP and ACA

Parameter.name: LOAD
Parameter.Description: load to apply when the DUT capacity is above BATT_START_CAPACITY
